  • Uses of Action in dev.webfx.extras.action.impl

    Classes in dev.webfx.extras.action.impl that implement Action
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    final class 
    ActionGroupImpl
     
    class 
    ReadOnlyAction
    A read-only action where properties are observable values.
    final class 
    SeparatorAction
     
    class 
    WritableAction
    A writable action where properties (text, graphic, disabled, visible) can be set later (ie after constructor call) either by calling the setters or by binding these properties (ex: writableTextProperty().bind(myTextProperty))
